title: Magic Island at Ala Moana Beach Park
seo_title: Magic Island at Ala Moana Beach Park | Aqua Waikiki Pearl
attraction_title: Magic Island at Ala Moana Beach Park
seo_description: Located across the street from the Ala Moana Center is a beloved beach park with a manmade peninsula called Magic Island - well worth a visit during your break!
contents_1: Located across the street from the Ala Moana Center is a beloved beach park with a manmade peninsula called “Magic Island.”
description: Located across the street from the Ala Moana Center is a beloved beach park with a manmade peninsula called “Magic Island.” This grassy lawn on the shore is a great spot to have a picnic, take a casual swim, play a game of Frisbee, or watch July 4th fireworks!
